text: O'Shea Jackson Sr. (born June 15, 1969), better known by his stage name Ice Cube, is an American rapper and actor. He was a member of the well-known rap group N.W.A. He is best known for popularizing the gangsta rap genre with the album "Straight Outta Compton" in 1988. After leaving N.W.A in December of 1989, he began his solo work. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * AmeriKKKa's Most Wanted (1990) * Death Certificate (1991) * The Predator (1992) * Lethal Injection (1993) * War & Peace Vol. 1 (The War Disc) (1998) * War & Peace Vol. 2 (The Peace Disc) (2000) * Laugh Now, Cry Later (2006) * Raw Footage (2008) * I Am the West (2010) * Everythang's Corrupt (2018) ==Filmography== ===Films=== Year Film Functioned as Role Director Producer Screenwriter Actor 1991 Boyz n the Hood Darin "Doughboy" Baker 1992 Trespass Savon 1993 CB4 Himself (cameo) 1994 The Glass Shield Teddy Woods 1995 Higher Learning Fudge Friday Craig Jones 1997 Dangerous Ground Vusi Madlazi Anaconda Danny Rich 1998 The Players Club Reggie I Got the Hook Up Gun runner 1999 Three Kings Sgt.
